Name: Smash MAGA! Trump Zombie Apocalypse
About the game: Hordes of brainwashed right-wing extremists have become infected with the Trump Zombie Plague and threaten the free world with fake-news-propagating hate speech. But there is one force that can stop them â€“ anti-fascism! Gamers, rise up and confront the infectious, indoctrinated mobs in Smash MAGA! Defend vaccination sites against diseased MAGA zealots! Disrupt white supremacist speaking events and dismantle symbols of colonization! And slap masks on science-denying fools right in their uncovered faces with a triple crossbow! Unapologetically anti-fascist, Smash MAGA! Trump Zombie Apocalypse is a politically-charged smash-and-run retro action adventure game (in the style of Smash TV) where you fight right-wing zombies at scenes like the Capitol Hill Riots and other historic events of our time. Version 1.1 release introduces new maps and full internet multiplayer and two player couch co-op support: fight fascists with your friends in cooperative, deathmatch, and capture the flag laser tag modes, and compete in online tournaments.
